nodes.text: Shavree was a Human female who sold a lightsaber to an Ithorian shopkeeper aboard the Ithorian Herdship Bazaar. She claimed the lightsaber was hers, but did not display an Force abilities to back up her claim.
Shavree was only mentioned in the reprinted Graveyard of Alderaan adventure that was included in Classic Adventures: Volume Two. She was not mentioned in the original printing of the adventure.
